reviewText: I purchased this for a 5 year old girl. She loves the Olsen twins. She does not know the video is from the mid 1990s, so I guess that says how timeless these videos are! She loves the singing and the silly story lines. I originally bought the VHS tape, and have now purchased the series on amazon instant video. You can purchase one episode, or the whole series. The video is about 30 minutes long. It is just the right lenght to hold the little ones attention. I am happy with this purchase.

I don't expect MK & A videos to be deeply educational or fabulously PC, but I do expect them to be nice. The song BUTT OUT, sung to their younger sister, caused me to fast forward this video and then to tell my children we weren't going to watch it again. Other than that, it's the same as any of the other videos in terms of quality, storyline, etc.

This is one of the better Olsen twins videos - they're cute, the songs are great, and IT ACTUALLY HAS A PLOT!!!  This movie is mainly for the younder fans, or those of us who've loved them since day 1.

Do you think these girl are the best?If you do I agree! I love the Twins in these Adventures they do and hey,I love these kinds of kiddy films if you do! I playin I love them anyway! The Olsen Twins show adult like ways in this 2nd episode of their episoede such as "Our First Video" and "Fun House Adventures" like I bought but,If you think a 13 year old likes it anyone can! For real!1
This is one of the better Olsen twin videos from when they were little. If you can't buy this, it should come on the Fox Family Channel in the mornings. You will probably enjoy it.
